Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1978...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1980, off Herbert Almond (Min)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1980, off Brian Wolf (PG)...
Drove in 7 runs against Manchester on 9/14/1983...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1984 (Going to WIS: P L. Marx, RF A. Sinclair. Going to PIT: LF A. Rahim, 1B K. Garrett, 3B J. Hollingsworth, CF B. Perales)...
Hit for the cycle against New Jersey on 9/19/1985...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New Jersey on 9/19/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 4/16/1986 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/8/1986 with a Bruised Heel, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston (UBA) on 2/2/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $700,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1988, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Championship with Boston (UBA) in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/9/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $632,500 per year...
